column2: "Hwɛ m'akowaa a mesuo no mu egyina; me nyia masan mu meyi no a me kra enyi gye no ho: medze mo sunsum ahyɛ no ma; ɔdze atsɛmbu bɛba Amanamamfo do."

column4: anaaso ɔremma wɔnntse ne ndze wɔ ɔbrɔn mu."
na asaaba a orupun wusiw no
column5: orunndum no: obeyi atsɛmbu edzi wɔ nokwar mu."

column3: ekodu dɛ ɔdze atsɛmbu esi asaase do; na nsuano aman tweɔn ne mbra."

column4: na ɔtserɛtserɛɛw mu; ɔno a ɔyeyeer asaase na dza ofi mu ba; ɔno a ɔdze nkwahwea ma no do nkorɔfo
column5: na ɔdze sunsum ma hɔn a wɔnenam mu:"

column2: "Emi mara EWURADZE na mafrɛ wo wɔ ndzeyɛtsenenee mu
column5: na medze wo ayɛ ɔman ahyɛmu

column4: na hɔn a wɔtsetse sum mu efi mpokyerɛ dan mu."

column2: "Emi mara nye EWURADZE; me dzin nye no: na meremmfa m'enyimnyam mma obi
column3: na m'ayɛyi so meremmfa mma ehonyi a woesian."

column4: na ndzɛmba afofor na meda no edzi: meka ho asɛm kyerɛ hom

column3: na hom mfi asaase ano noho ntow n'ayɛyindwom; hom a hom sian kɔfow po

column2: "Wɔmma sar na no do nkurow no mma hɔn ndze do
column3: nkuroba a Kedar tse do no; wɔmma Selafo ntow enyigye ndwom
column4: wɔmma womfi mbepɔw etsifi mbɔ ose."

column3: na wɔnda n'ayɛyi edzi wɔ nsuano aman mu."

column2: "EWURADZE befir edzi dɛ ɔkatakyi; obekenyan nyinkun dɛ ɔsabarimba: ɔbɛtsea mu
column4: ɔbɔbɔ ose; obedzi n'atamfo do akatakyisɛm."

column2: "Maka m'ano ato mu akyɛr; mayɛ komm
column3: na mesianka moho: afei dze mebɛtsea mu dɛ ɔbaa a ɔroko awoo; mebɛkyem na megu ahom prɛko."
na mama hɔn do nhabamba nyinara egunguan; na madan nsutsen no nsupruw

column2: "Na medze efurafo bɛfa ɔtsempɔn a wonnyim do no do aba; ɔkwan a wonnyim mu no mu na mibegya hɔn afa: mebɛma sum ayɛ kan wɔ hɔn enyim
column4: matsentsen no. Ndzɛmba iyinom na mebɛyɛ
hɔn a wɔtwer ehonyi a woesian hɔn a wɔse ehonyi a woegu dɛ
tse dɛ mo bɔfoe a mosoma no no? Woana na n'enyi efura tse dɛ nyia ɔnye me tse asomdwee mu no
column5: anaa oefura tse dɛ EWURADZE n'akowaa no?"

column3: naaso ennhyɛ no nsew; n'aso ebue

column2: "Na iyinom dze wɔyɛ aman a woetwa hɔn dwo na wɔafa hɔn afo; woesuasua hɔn nyinara mfir wɔ etu mu
column3: na wɔdze hɔn esumasuma mpokyerɛfo adan mu: wɔayɛ afonam
column4: na obi nngye hɔn nkwa; wɔayɛ asadze

column2: "Hom mu woana na ɔbɛma iyi aso? Ɔbɛkyɛn aso etsie ndaamba asɛm?"
"Woana na ɔdze Jakob maa dɛ afonam
column3: na ɔdze Israel maa edwotwafo no? Ana nnyɛ EWURADZE bi a? Ɔno a yɛayɛ bɔn etsia no
column6: eso wɔannyɛ setsie amma ne mbra."

column2: "Dɛm ntsi na ohuee n'ebufuhyew na ɔko ne dzendzen guu no do; na ɔtoo no gya hyiae
column4: naaso ɔammfa annhyɛ no werɛ mu."
